title: Academic Library Online Research Guide: Instructional Design and Accessibility-Centered Redesign

context.prior_knowledge: Library resource search skills and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: In-service professionals redesigning science research guides through project-based implementation.

learning_goals: Learners can apply pedagogical principles (optimizing learner pathways, integrating interactive elements) when designing online research guide structures.
Learners can implement accessibility requirements (keyboard navigation, alternative text, etc.) aligned with WCAG 2.1 AA standards in guides.
Learners can systematize science research material recommendations by analyzing topic-centric search patterns.
Learners can prototype guide scenarios tailored to real library use cases through PBL team activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
